research

My primary research interests concern the philosophy of machine learning and its intersections with general philosophy of science, ethics and public policy, cognitive science, and philosophy of neuroscience. I am also interested in social and political philosophy, American pragmatism, and feminist philosophy. Click below to explore my ongoing projects and papers in progress.
